memory: 读烹饪书(book)百遍， 厨(cook)艺自现

trans.en: someone who drives a car, bus etc

sentences.v: 出租车司机
sentences.tran: a taxi driver

sentences.v: 你认为自己是个好司机吗？
sentences.tran: Do you think you’re a good driver?

ws.tran: 强劲的；推进的；精力旺盛的

畜群；牛群、羊群等；移动的人群或大批的东西
把家畜赶到市集的人；家畜商人；牲畜贩子

trans.en: someone who owns or manages a farm

sentences.v: 我从农民那里租下了一小块地。
sentences.tran: I have subleased a plot from the farmer.

sentences.v: 那个农民挨家挨户兜售他的水果。
sentences.tran: The farmer peddled his fruit from house to house.

sentences.v: 作为农民，你应该学会怎样把一对牛用轭连起来。
sentences.tran: As a farmer, you should learn how to yoke the oxen together.

trans.en: someone whose job is to look after people who are ill or injured, usually in a hospital

sentences.v: 护士会来给你打针。
sentences.tran: The nurse is coming to give you an injection.

sentences.v: 学校的护士送萨拉回家。
sentences.tran: The school nurse sent Sara home.

sentences.v: 男护士
sentences.tran: a male nurse

sentences.v: 高级护士
sentences.tran: a senior nurse

sentences.v: 实习护士
sentences.tran: a student nurse (= someone who is learning to be a nurse )

sentences.v: 精神病院护士
sentences.tran: a psychiatric nurse (= a nurse for people who are mentally ill )

sentences.v: 社区护士
sentences.tran: a community nurse

ws.tran: 养成；教育；培养（形容词nurturant）；养育

phrases.v: 护理师，护师；执业护师，开业护士

synos.tran: 看护，护理；照顾；培养；给…喂奶

trans.en: used as the plural of ‘person’ to refer to men, women, and children

sentences.v: 有多少人到会？
sentences.tran: How many people were at the meeting?

sentences.v: 至少有40人遇害。
sentences.tran: At least 40 people were killed.

sentences.v: 住在隔壁的那些人
sentences.tran: the people who live next door

phrases.v: [口语](西方世界所谓的)上流社会人士

trans.en: used to connect two statements or phrases when the second one adds something different or seems surprising after the first one

sentences.v: 这是一辆旧车，但是性能非常可靠。
sentences.tran: It’s an old car, but it’s very reliable.

sentences.v: 他们急忙赶到医院，但是已经太迟了。
sentences.tran: They rushed to the hospital, but they were too late.

sentences.v: 我们邀请过老板，但她有可能决定不来。
sentences.tran: We’ve invited the boss, but she may decide not to come.

sentences.v: 价钱很贵却是非常有用的一本书
sentences.tran: an expensive but extremely useful book

sentences.v: “他有经验吗？”“没有，但他非常好学。”
sentences.tran: ‘Has he got any experience?’ ‘No, but he’s keen to learn.’

phrases.v: [美国口语]彻底地，完全；狠狠地；有力地；毫无疑问

trans.en: small in size

sentences.v: 小屋
sentences.tran: a little house

sentences.v: 点缀着小花的蛋糕
sentences.tran: a cake decorated with little flowers

sentences.v: 她把肉切成小丁。
sentences.tran: She was cutting the meat up into little bits.

phrases.v: 并不比…好；简直和…一样(坏)；简直就是
与…不相上于；与…几乎相同

synos.tran: 小的；很少的；短暂的；小巧可爱的

trans.en: a young dog

sentences.v: 一只六个月大的小狗
sentences.tran: a six-month-old puppy

phrases.v: 早年初恋；少男少女间短暂的爱情（等于calf love）

sentences.v: 他开始当一名足球运动员。
sentences.tran: He broke in as a football player.

sentences.v: 这个足球运动员经验不足。
sentences.tran: The football player is lacking in experience.

sentences.v: 他们都称赞他是本市最佳足球运动员。
sentences.tran: They admired him as the city's best football player.

trans.en: the regular paid work that you do for an employer

sentences.v: 你喜欢自己的工作吗？
sentences.tran: Do you enjoy your job?

sentences.v: 这是我第一份拿工资的工作。
sentences.tran: It was the first paid job I ever had.

sentences.v: 他干这份工作有六年了。
sentences.tran: He’s been in the job for six years.

sentences.v: 我在找一份新工作。
sentences.tran: I’m looking for a new job.

sentences.v: 换工作的话，会影响到你的退休金。
sentences.tran: Your pension can be affected if you change jobs.

trans.en: a game played indoors between two teams of five players, in which each team tries to win points by throwing a ball through a net

sentences.v: 我们爱打篮球。
sentences.tran: We love playing basketball.

sentences.v: 他因受伤而不能打篮球了。
sentences.tran: His injury incapacitated him for playing basketball.

sentences.v: 他们翻遍了整个教室寻找他们的篮球。
sentences.tran: They ransacked the whole classroom for their basketball.

phrases.v: n. 篮球选手；篮球球员
